title: Transfer Learning Techniques
summary: This document discusses transfer learning, a machine learning technique that leverages knowledge from one task to improve performance on another related task. content_preview: Transfer learning involves fine-tuning the weights of a pre-trained upstream model to adapt it to the downstream task.
